channel.title: Questionable Ethics...
channel.description:
I always loved how in Questionable Ethics it became apparent to the player that the scientists had already encountered these Xen aliens before. There are multiple rooms were alien grunts and headcrabs are kept for further study. This was then further established in Opposing Force, the Biodome Complex for example.
There were also some seemingly pointless cases in HL1 that didn't seem too scientific, like the cage filled with half a dozen headcrabs that were then electrocuted with no apparent furthering of how these things live.
But I would love to see some more of this in BMS. Like glass cylinders where dead vortigaunts are suspended in liquid, or a small observation room built into the wall where you can see a (living) houndeye. And also some dissection tables with dissected headcrabs and maybe some headcrabbed HEV scientists since there must certainly have been some cases of the science team sent to Xen being headcrabbed.
So what do you think, any chance to see some of these ideas accepted?

item.title: Questionable Ethics...
item.dc:creator: Deutscher_Scharfschu
item.description:
It’s ashame that before the crash i had posted a bunch of screen shots of different mods and some art work. i looked on my backup hard drive for like 20 minutes but couldn’t find them.

most of them were from MINERVA. I would like to see this chapter have a simular feeling of shock and mystery and this should be done with a lot of scripted scenes and use of the particle editor for blood spray and other fluids.

i think lighting is key to this chapter aswell, very focused beams of light should light the path between the labs with an ocasional flicker to illuminate a entirety of a room revealing all of the expreiments/horrors.

i also think the there could be great scripted sequences between xenians and HECU. e.g. the curious gasmasker poking at a bullsquid on a lab table only to have the bullsquid jump up and swallow the marine whole.

P.S. I’m deutscher Scharfschütze

Read full topic

item.title: Questionable Ethics...
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
stormseeker:

I heard it was some fat guy from England.

Whilst we’re keeping as close to hl1 as possible, that would be terribly boring. But as someone pointed out the ideas have been aroung a while, and the documentation I wrote up for this chapter has been around since 2006. I suspect you’ll see some new things to peak your interest along with all the old favourites.

But do ask questions, I’ll try and answer them as cryptically as possible.

Some fat guy from England huh, well that narrows it down a wee bit

Read full topic
